verses.text: They that trust in the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*shall beas mount Zion, whichcannot be removed, butabideth for ever.
As the mountains areround about Jerusalem, so the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*isround about his people from henceforth even for ever.
For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.
Do good, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, unto those that begood, and to them that areupright in their hearts.
As for such as turn aside unto their crooked ways, the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: butpeace shall beupon Israel.
